item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Happy Hours series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in New Haven.

This week's location is:
KUDETA

In honor of New Haven's first ever Restaurant Week, I thought it fitting that we head to one of the more unique dining establishments in town. Kudeta is an asian fusion restaurant where "you can experience the flavors of Asian cusine in an atmosphere designed to captivate your senses."

Drink Specials:
$1.00 off well drinks
$1.00 off draft beer

**UPDATE** Kudeta has reserved the front sushi room for the NHC for our happy hour, so you can find the group there after grabbing a drink at the bar.

Your contact is: Ben (203) 554-5144

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...

Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours.

Ever.

***Bring a friend***
item.name: Happy Hour - Kudeta
